location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File 9/22 Naval & Shipping: Movements of other foreign warships in the Gulf'

physicalDescription.extent: The file is arranged in chronological order, from the front to the rear.

Foliation: the main foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 7; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. An additional foliation sequence is present in parallel between ff 2-7; these numbers are also written in pencil, but are not circled.

mods.abstract: Correspondence concerning the visit of French naval vessel Bougainvilleto Muscat. The correspondence is between the Political Agent in Muscat, Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, French Consul in Bombay [Mumbai], and representatives of the Sultan of Muscat. The papers cover notice of the impending visit and the Political Agent's brief report of proceedings (folios 5-6).

name.namePart: Sultan of Muscat and Oman, Āl Bū Sa'īd Dynasty
